long_description: Incredibly water-resistant and durable, the Patagonia 25L Black Hole Daypack protects your climbing, commuting or beach gear in all but the wettest conditions. Sturdy, heavyweight duffel fabric features a water-resistant laminate and durable water repellent finish to bead up water so it rolls right off. Cavernous main compartment offers an organizer panel, mesh pocket and key keeper. Padded sleeve holds most 15 in. laptops or a hydration reservoir. Zippered pocket on lid features a water-shedding reverse-coil zipper and daisy-chain lash points; front panel has concealed pocket and additional laser-cut lash points. Padded shoulder harness, sternum strap and simple webbing belt ensure a comfortable and secure carry; side compression straps help manage loads. Patagonia 25L Black Hole Daypack has a molded back panel that sheds moisture and allows airflow for all-day carrying comfort.
short_description: Incredibly water-resistant and durable, the Patagonia 25L Black Hole Daypack protects your climbing, commuting or beach gear in all but the wettest conditions.
